nodes.text: The sea caves were a network of submersed caves on the planet Iskalon. During the time of the Cold War, a proxy conflict between the Sith Empire and Galactic Republic, the dropping sea levels revealed the long-hidden caves that had been occupied centuries before. Eventually, someone was sent to investigate them, discovering that the caves had been used by the native species to hide from slavers and their possessions could still be found inside the caves.
